full_description:
Asus ROG BP1501G 17" Laptop Gaming Backpack

The Asus ROG BP1501G 17" Laptop Gaming Backpack is the perfect companion for gamers on the go. Its stylish design is inspired by gaming aesthetics, featuring a captivating cyber-text pattern and the iconic ROG Logo, making it an eye-catching accessory that complements your gaming gear. The backpack is equipped with a convenient quick-access exterior pocket, allowing you to easily reach and store your essential gaming accessories, such as a gaming mouse, headphones, or charging cables. This ensures that you can swiftly grab what you need without having to dig through the main compartment. The backpack offers a generous 18L interior, providing ample space for transporting your gaming laptop. With a maximum capacity of up to 17 inches, it can comfortably accommodate most gaming notebooks on the market. The well-padded interior also ensures that your laptop remains safe and protected during transit. The Asus ROG BP1501G is crafted from water-repellent materials, safeguarding your gaming equipment from light rain and accidental spills. Additionally, the backpack's lightweight design, weighing only 0.48 kg, makes it easy to carry around, even during extended gaming sessions or when traveling. The backpack is constructed using premium-quality materials, including Polyester and Reversed Polyester. These materials are known for their durability and ability to withstand the rigors of daily use, making the backpack a long-lasting and reliable choice for gamers. The backpack's overall dimensions are 43.00 x 30.00 x 14.50 cm, providing a compact and manageable size for easy transportation. The notebook compartment measures 38.40 x 26.20 x 3.00 cm, ensuring a snug fit for your gaming laptop while leaving room for other accessories in the main compartment. Whether you're heading to a gaming event, a friend's house for a LAN party, or simply want a stylish and functional backpack for your daily commute, the Asus ROG BP1501G 17" Laptop Gaming Backpack ticks all the boxes. Its gaming-inspired design, well-thought-out features, and durable build make it an excellent choice for passionate gamers who want to carry their gear in style and with peace of mind.

full_description:
Asus ROG Archer BP1505 15.6" Laptop Gaming Backpack

The Asus ROG Archer BP1505 15.6" Laptop Gaming Backpack is a versatile and stylish backpack designed to cater to the needs of gamers and urban adventurers alike. Its sleek and rugged design features three distinct carrying options, making it easy to carry around wherever you go. With a spacious 16L storage capacity, it provides ample space to carry all your daily essentials, gaming gear, and accessories. The ROG Archer Backpack is its durable and water-repellent Cordura fabric construction. This high-quality material ensures that your belongings stay safe and dry even in adverse weather conditions, offering all-weather protection. Additionally, the Cordura 610D fabric is lightweight, making the backpack comfortable to wear for extended periods. The modular compartment customization of the backpack allows you to organize your belongings efficiently, making it ideal for both gaming equipment and daily essentials. Its NB (notebook) compartment is specifically designed to fit a 15.6-inch laptop, keeping your precious gaming machine secure and well-protected during your travels. The dimensions of the NB compartment are 36.00 x 26.80 x 2.69 cm, ensuring compatibility with various laptop models. The ROG Archer Backpack features a 3-in-1 design, which means you can carry it as a traditional backpack, use the detachable shoulder straps to convert it into a messenger bag, or carry it as a briefcase using the sturdy side handle. This versatility makes it suitable for various situations and personal preferences. Safety is also taken into consideration with the inclusion of reflective elements on the backpack. These reflective details increase your visibility during low-light conditions, providing an extra layer of safety during night-time travels. To ensure reliable and smooth access to your belongings, the backpack is equipped with high-quality YKK zippers. YKK is renowned for producing durable and long-lasting zippers, adding to the overall durability and functionality of the ROG Archer BP1505. With the ROG Archer Backpack 15.6", you can enjoy worry-free travel on your urban adventures, knowing that your belongings are well-protected and easily accessible. Whether you're heading to school, the office, or on a gaming marathon with friends, this backpack is designed to keep up with your dynamic lifestyle.

ASUS ROG Ranger BP3703G RGB Gaming Backpack

ASUS ROG Ranger BP3703G is an RGB Gaming Backpack. ROG Ranger BP3703 RGB modular gaming backpack featuring charge-cable passthrough, anti-theft zip, and water repellent exterior fits up to 17-inch laptop suitable for travel. It has Aura RGB dynamic illumination with adaptive brightness, plus an internal light strip for easy organization. ROG Ranger BP3703 Gaming Backpack is the first ROG backpack to incorporate Aura RGB effects and loads of travel-friendly features. The modular design makes it easy to detach your essentials when needed, while waterâ€“repellent materials, rain cover, and security features keep you protected on the go. With a 20L capacity thatâ€™s big enough for a 17â€™â€™ laptop and essential stuff, BP3703 is all you need to transport your gaming gear and travel kit to every tournament. Ranger BP3703â€™s bold ROG logo and slash illuminate to seven preset effects and a choice of eight striking colors, with a brightness that reacts automatically to the ambient lighting conditions â€“ all easily managed by an IPX4 splash-proof intuitive one-touch controller. Thereâ€™s even a bright-white internal light strip to make it easy to see and find your stuff, even in the dark. Just attach your own power bank, and light up anywhere. The Modular front compartment doubles as a messenger bag, with an RFID-blocking pocket to provide additional security on the go. It also lets you pack fast and travel safely with suitcase-style zip, anti-theft zip clip, and hidden backrest pocket. It is also equipped with Padded adjustable shoulder straps, breathable air-mesh back padding, plus a chest strap for absolute comfort. it also comes with a built-in USB connector to drive Aura RGB illumination via your own power bank.
